attributes.action: CLOSE SCHOOLS AMIDST CORONA VIRUS SPREAD
attributes.additional_details: In order to  maintain the health and safety of our children,vulnerable adults and our college and university students from contacting the virus, the government needs to courageously announce the closure of the schools in the UK before it is too late.Corona will be spreading more targeting more and more people in public places .
attributes.background: I want the government to consider seriously the closure of schools in the UK amidst the increasing spread of Corona Virus .
